lines.text: Its nice to see you again.
Someone recently told me that were married and living together. He even said that we have twins. Can you imagine!
Who was that, I will kill him.
Hey, Get out of here. You are ruining my business. My customers will think I am so lame, my pimp has to drive a taxi.
What's the matter with you? Are you mad about something?
You men only thinking about making babies. Is a whore supposed to have kids?
All you have to do is find yourself a pimp who can change diapers
hah!. Why don't you become my pimp. 30%. I will have a New Age pimp. Pimp who is in touch with his feelings.

[climbing into his lorry to find the kidnappers]
A man's gotta do what a man's gotta do.
